title: Morgana's mana costs seem too low to me...
body:
Been playing a bit of morgana lately, just in norms.  used to play her all the time.

Wanted to check out her new W and stuff.  And wow.  She's quite oppressive in lane.  Almost as bad as malzahar.

Nearly infinite mana on nearly instant wave clear.  I have routinely been 40-50 CS up on my opponent, and once I get an item or 2, I can pretty much kill them for free with flash + W + R + Ignite or Q + W + R + Ignite.

Combine that with almost complete immunity from ganks via her spell shield, and she's pretty strong ATM.  And honestly I think it all stems from the fact that her mana costs are basically non existent.

But hey...  that's just one gold player's opinion.

replies.body:
110 mana at max rank on her W.

Get gud/play against better opponents
